thread.title: Check Out The Promo Of The Sequel To “Diya Aur Baati Hum”
thread.title_full: Check Out The Promo Of The Sequel To “Diya Aur Baati Hum”

title: Check Out The Promo Of The Sequel To “Diya Aur Baati Hum”
text:
facebook 
Diya Aur Baati Hum had quite some fan following, and the makers of the show are back once again with a sequel to keep you hooked. After a successful run of five years, the new show will take forward the story of the lead pair Sandhya (Dipika Singh) and Sooraj's (Anas Rashid) daughter, Kanak. 
Titled Tu Sooraj, Main Saanjh Piyaji the show takes a leap of 20 years, and takes the story ahead after the death of the leading pair. Rhea Sharma and Avinash Rekhi will be seen in lead roles, and the show airs on April 3 on Star Plus. 
Here's the promo. Let us know if you are excited too. Photo credits: Twitter
